1:
My name is Kobole.
I live in a small village.
2: I was out picking fruits when I saw something I had never seen before.
3: There were colourful lines in the sky.
4:
I dropped all the fruit
and ran to tell people at home.
6:
I said happily, “It is a beautiful sheet hanging from the sky.”
“No! I think someone is pouring paint from the sky.” Neno said.
7:
Some people agreed
with me. Others thought Neno was right.
We began to argue.
8: A man from a faraway village said, “You are all wrong.”
9:
We shouted,
“Tell us what it is if we are wrong.”
10:
The stranger said,
“It is the rainbow.
Have you never seen
the rainbow before?”
11:
We asked the stranger,
“What is a r-a-i-n-b-o-w?”
12:
Neno asked, “Is it ours? Can we keep it here?”
We never got answers to our questions because the man had left.
